name: Space game (cant name it)
description:
I've been trying to name this game for over a month now

Your space facility is being invaded by a random alien slime thing, and you must get away from it as it tries to consume you. Have fun and good luck running away from that thing!

This is only the 1st prototype of the game. As of right now, there is no proper UI or sound effects, they will be added soon (this winter maybe). I also intend to make several balance changes to the obstacles and enemies since they all still feel a bit off.

Also sometimes your bullets won't register upon hitting an enemy, that is because unity has a crappy collision system and so far it seems like there's no workaround for it. I might as well just switch to Godot in the next update, LOL
